alert.note: Alert for Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 18 at 4:05AM MDT until October 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Wednesday afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 226, 227, and 234... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226, 227, AND 234... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226, 227 and 234. * Winds...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
